mapper.select: select d.abnormal_no, d.materials_no, d.materials_des, d.materials_type, t.reason_name, t.reason_id, t.sap_order, t.status from abnormal_out_detail d left join abnormal_out t on d.ABNORMAL_NO = t.abnormal_no where d.status in (1, 2)

select d.abnormal_no, d.materials_no, d.materials_des, d.materials_type, t.reason_name, t.reason_id, t.sap_order, t.status from abnormal_out_detail d left join abnormal_out t on d.ABNORMAL_NO = t.abnormal_no where d.status = 0
